TEXT.TITLE: ST PAUL HOGS UP 1.00/2.00 DLRS - USDA
TEXT.BODY: barrow and gilt prices rose 1.00 to 2.00 dlrs in very active trade amid broad demand, the usda said. top 52.50 dlrs per cwt. us 1-3 220-260 lbs 51.00-52.50. sows - up 0.50/1.50 dlr. us 1-3 500-650 lbs 46.50-47.00. Reuter
